---
title: "geomarea"
---

    geomarea(geom)

### Parameters
* `geom`: the geometry. This can either be a GDAL AbstractGeometry or a {{< gmtref GMTdataset type=gmttype >}} (or vector of it), or a Matrix

Returns the area of the geometry or 0.0 for unsupported geometry types.
